name: places/ChIJgfYi6qxZwokRHkzgJnrHaRI
formattedAddress: 140 W 22nd St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 140 W 22nd St, New York, NY 10011-2420, USA

originalText.text:
Having been with Ikon New York modeling agency for more than 18 years, I can confidently say that they are an excellent agency. Cynthia, who handles bookings, is not only professional but also dedicated to her work, even willing to work on weekends to ensure everything is well-managed. Her commitment extends to making sure that models receive their paychecks promptly and fairly, which is truly commendable. Through Ikon New York, I've had the opportunity to participate in numerous print
campaigns with excellent compensation. Despite relocating to LA, I have chosen to continue my association with Ikon New York as they have consistently proven their worth. Thank you, Ikon and Cynthia, for your outstanding support and representation!

originalText.text: I have known Cynthia and Ikon Model Management since the 1990s.  I was once a model, and I even worked there at one point.  Ikon Model Management has always been very professional to both me, and its models.  They bring a ton of knowledge about the business and are able to get great bookings.  They treat their models like family and have that "small business" white glove feel.

originalText.text: I have worked with Ikon in New York for over 10 years and cannot recommend them enough. Cynthia is fantastic to work with and really cares about all her models. Anyone lucky enough to be offered a place on Ikons books would be representing a professional, caring and reputable agency. Thank you Cynthia for everything you have done for me.

text.text: I have worked with Ikon in New York for over 10 years and cannot recommend them enough. Cynthia is fantastic to work with and really cares about all her models. Anyone lucky enough to be offered a place on Ikons books would be representing a professional, caring and reputable agency. Thank you Cynthia for everything you have done for me.

originalText.text: Cynthia is one of the kindest humans you could have in your life. This agency is no BS, it’s real jobs that pay well. She cares about every model and will work hands on with you to help build your portfolio, help you with social media, and give you real advice for your future. She wants everyone to be as successful as possible. She never limits what you can do or who you can work with. So grateful for this agency that’s been a dear part of my life for almost a decade now.

originalText.text:
Ikon Models & Management NY is a very upstanding, outstanding, efficient — and unusually empathetic — agency; very reliable and consistent in  reaching out when there are appropriate roles …Cynthia always answers questions and works with you to make you feel comfortable about an audition  -
Please Note : there is another agency in Amsterdam using their exact name !
